name: airport_id
description: Unique OpenFlights identifier for this airport

name: name
description: Name of airport. May or may not contain the City name

name: city
description: Main city served by airport. May be spelled differently from Name.

name: country
description: Country or territory where airport is located.

name: IATA_FAA
description: 3-letter FAA code, for airports located in USA, 3-letter IATA code, for all other airports.

name: timezone
description: Hours offset from UTC. Fractional hours are expressed as decimals

name: DST
description: Daylight savings time. One of E (Europe), A (US/Canada), S (South America), O (Australia), Z (New Zealand), N (None) or U (Unknown)
